name: part_003
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】遂に復帰‼重大告知ライブ【#星街すいせい重大告知】 [CPUYPXa7D7s]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Continuation of the performance of the song 'GHOST'.
Performance of the song 'Bye Bye Rainy'.

subtitles.original: 灰色の街が笑っても　もう足取りも重くなる
subtitles.english: Even if the grey city laughs, my steps are getting heavier

subtitles.original: 声を枯らして叫んで足掻いて裸足で走り続けて
subtitles.english: Screaming until my voice goes hoarse, struggling, running barefoot

subtitles.original: 変わらないように　嫌われないように
subtitles.english: So that I don't change, so that I won't be hated

subtitles.original: 戸惑い続けてるだけだ
subtitles.english: I'm just continuing to be lost

subtitles.original: 見つけてよ僕を
subtitles.english: Please find me

subtitles.original: 僕のこの声が聞こえてる？
subtitles.english: Can you hear this voice of mine?

subtitles.original: 点在だったシルエットさえも透明になってきっと
subtitles.english: Even the scattered silhouettes will surely become transparent

subtitles.original: 虚構を叫べど　でもせめて声を
subtitles.english: Even if I scream out a fiction, at least let my voice...

subtitles.original: 枯らそう　必死に縋ってもずっと
subtitles.english: Go hoarse, even if I cling on desperately forever

subtitles.original: 証明を願うのさ　いたいよ
subtitles.english: I'll wish for proof, it hurts

subtitles.original:
バイバイレイニー
作詞・作曲：堀江晶太
subtitles.english:
Bye Bye Rainy
Lyrics & Composition: Shota Horie

subtitles.original: クラップサイド　乾いた正装
subtitles.english: Clap side, dry formal wear

subtitles.original: ガラガラ透けた　右はサスペンダー
subtitles.english: Empty and transparent, suspenders on the right

subtitles.original: どんな言葉にもちゃんと綻びがあった
subtitles.english: Every word had its own flaw

subtitles.original: 光彩も言わずにアッソー
subtitles.english: Not even mentioning the brilliance, "I see"

subtitles.original: どうでもいい朝になれすぎて
subtitles.english: I've become too accustomed to these trivial mornings

subtitles.original: 傘は持ってない　感じてた未来
subtitles.english: I don't have an umbrella, the future I felt

subtitles.original: 返しけず　交わしけず　ガラガラ
subtitles.english: Unable to return it, unable to dodge it, empty

subtitles.original: 街行く　よそ者
subtitles.english: Strangers passing through the city

subtitles.original: ねぇ独りだった　壊せたのはレイニー
subtitles.english: Hey, I was alone, what I could break was Rainy

subtitles.original: レイニー　君を連れ出さないで
subtitles.english: Rainy, don't take you away

subtitles.original: 悲しくはないよ　嬉しくもないよ　レイニー
subtitles.english: I'm not sad, nor am I happy, Rainy

subtitles.original: レイニー　よく晴れた鈍色へ
subtitles.english: Rainy, towards the clear dark grey

subtitles.original: 限定式の　嘘を染めるレイニー
subtitles.english: A limited formula, Rainy dyes the lies

subtitles.original: レイニー　こんな間違いだらけで
subtitles.english: Rainy, in a place so full of mistakes

subtitles.original: リリース一歩のパノラマ　レイニー　レイニー
subtitles.english: A panorama one step away from release, Rainy, Rainy

subtitles.original: 今日は何点だったろ？
subtitles.english: I wonder what the score was today?

subtitles.original: バイバイ　バイバイ　よく晴れた鈍色の証拠
subtitles.english: Bye bye, bye bye, proof of the clear dark grey

subtitles.original: 空をクラクション　操ってお目見え
subtitles.english: Manipulating the car horns in the sky, making an appearance

subtitles.original: 光買ったなら　染めてよくだけ
subtitles.english: If you bought light, just dye it better

subtitles.original: 泣いて泣いて泣いて残った
subtitles.english: What remained after crying and crying and crying

subtitles.original: パスパス今日も明日も来ないだろう
subtitles.english: Passing, passing, today and tomorrow probably won't come

subtitles.original: 喧騒　五分の　素直な声
subtitles.english: Five minutes of clamor, an honest voice

subtitles.original: 夢中の裏
subtitles.english: Behind being engrossed

subtitles.original: 白い煙に吹かれながら歌う
subtitles.english: Singing while being blown by white smoke

subtitles.original: 救いのない甘い事
subtitles.english: Sweet things with no salvation

subtitles.original: ねぇ独りだった　壊せたのはレイニー
subtitles.english: Hey, I was alone, what I could break was Rainy

subtitles.original: レイニー　そんな透明なキス
subtitles.english: Rainy, such a transparent kiss

subtitles.original: 確かな声に　似ている青にバイバイ
subtitles.english: To the blue that resembles a certain voice, bye bye

subtitles.original: バイバイ　しなくちゃいけないの
subtitles.english: Bye bye, I have to do it

subtitles.original: ほんの僅かに　雨の合間に
subtitles.english: Just for a moment, in between the rain

subtitles.original: 君も行くなら　道中を祈ってる
subtitles.english: If you're going too, I'll pray for your journey

subtitles.original: 無事を祈ってる
subtitles.english: I'll pray for your safety

subtitles.original: ねぇ独りだった　壊せたのはレイニー
subtitles.english: Hey, I was alone, what I could break was Rainy

subtitles.original: レイニー　君を連れ出さないで
subtitles.english: Rainy, don't take you away

subtitles.original: 悲しくはないよ　嬉しくもないよ　レイニー
subtitles.english: I'm not sad, nor am I happy, Rainy

subtitles.original: レイニー　よく晴れた鈍色へ
subtitles.english: Rainy, towards the clear dark grey

subtitles.original: 限定式の　嘘を染めるレイニー
subtitles.english: A limited formula, Rainy dyes the lies

subtitles.original: レイニー　こんな間違いだらけで
subtitles.english: Rainy, in a place so full of mistakes

subtitles.original: リリース一歩のパノラマ　レイニー　レイニー
subtitles.english: A panorama one step away from release, Rainy, Rainy

subtitles.original: 今日は何点だったよ？　バイバイ　バイバイ
subtitles.english: I wonder what the score was today? Bye bye, bye bye
